content.html: One of the worst sex offenders in recent history served as a Met officer for 20 years. Despite the police being repeatedly told of allegations, he was allowed to serve, carry a gun and use his position to assault women. This is not a “bad apple”. The problem is institutional.
content.value:
One of the worst sex offenders in recent history served as a Met officer for 20 years.

Despite the police being repeatedly told of allegations, he was allowed to serve, carry a gun and use his position to assault women.

This is not a “bad apple”. The problem is institutional.
